risks.title: Parser acceptance drift against declared ES baseline
risks.mitigation_summary: Maintain parser fixture matrix and block promotions on conformance regressions.
risks.rollback_plan: Revert to previous parser artifact snapshot and disable newly introduced grammar branches.

risks.title: TS normalization mismatch creates hidden runtime divergence
risks.mitigation_summary: Use deterministic normalization artifacts and parity checks against reference TS behavior.
risks.rollback_plan: Pin previous normalization profile and reject unsupported TS options fail-closed.

risks.title: Placeholder execution path leaks into production gate decisions
risks.mitigation_summary: Force pipeline coverage checks that require real parse->lower->execute artifacts.
risks.rollback_plan: Block release and restore last validated runtime lane implementation.
open_actions: assert no normalized-source echo path in release profile

risks.title: Module resolution ambiguity breaks ecosystem compatibility
risks.mitigation_summary: Record deterministic resolution traces and fail on unresolved alias/extension conflicts.
risks.rollback_plan: Rollback resolver profile and force previous stable module mapping policy.

risks.title: Capability metadata missing or malformed causes privilege inflation
risks.mitigation_summary: Fail-closed capability extraction and enforce hostcall dispatch contracts.
risks.rollback_plan: Disable untrusted extension lane and enforce safe-mode capability baseline.

risks.title: IFC enforcement gaps allow covert data exfiltration
risks.mitigation_summary: Run IFC declassification gates with deterministic side-channel fixtures.
risks.rollback_plan: Suspend adaptive policies and enforce strongest IFC profile pending remediation.

risks.title: Containment latency regressions violate safety SLO
risks.mitigation_summary: Track containment p95 and block promotions if threshold exceeds 250ms.
risks.rollback_plan: Revert scheduler/tier-up changes and restore previous containment path.

risks.title: Tier-up policy introduces correctness regressions under load
risks.mitigation_summary: Require semantic parity checks before tier-up activation.
risks.rollback_plan: Pin execution to baseline tier and disable hot-path tier-up.

risks.title: Benchmark claims published without significance support
risks.mitigation_summary: Require variance and confidence interval evidence for every claim.
risks.rollback_plan: Retract unsupported claims and rerun benchmark suite with full statistics.

risks.title: Differential lockstep drift classification backlog grows unresolved
risks.mitigation_summary: Prioritize unresolved drift fingerprints and maintain actionable classifier outputs.
risks.rollback_plan: Freeze release gate progression until drift backlog drops below threshold.
open_actions: auto-open remediation beads for new engine_bug drift

risks.title: test262 shard instability obscures true regressions
risks.mitigation_summary: Track flake signatures and quarantine non-deterministic shards.
risks.rollback_plan: Revert shard scheduling changes and rerun deterministic baseline shard map.

risks.title: Release evidence package missing deterministic replay instructions
risks.mitigation_summary: Require artifact triad and replay command verification before cutline advancement.
risks.rollback_plan: Invalidate release candidate and regenerate evidence bundle from last green manifest.

risks.title: Operator runbook ambiguity delays incident mitigation
risks.mitigation_summary: Standardize operator diagnostics and required command transcripts.
risks.rollback_plan: Escalate to manual hold and block auto-promotion while runbook is corrected.

risks.title: Structured logging schema drift breaks cross-lane triage
risks.mitigation_summary: Validate log schemas in CI and reject incompatible field removals.
risks.rollback_plan: Rollback schema changes and rehydrate previous parser for events.

risks.title: Cross-track dependency inversion reintroduces cycle risk
risks.mitigation_summary: Run dependency cycle checks after every gatebook/risk-register update.
risks.rollback_plan: Revert dependency mutation and restore previously acyclic graph.

risks.title: Monorepo path collision between gate artifacts and lane outputs
risks.mitigation_summary: Namespace artifact roots by gate and timestamp.
risks.rollback_plan: Archive conflicting artifacts and rerun affected gate with isolated output paths.

risks.title: Third-party reproducibility host mismatch invalidates claim
risks.mitigation_summary: Publish environment manifest and enforce strict replay preflight checks.
risks.rollback_plan: Hold GA cutline until external rerun bundle revalidates successfully.

risks.title: Adaptive safe-mode demotion triggers oscillate under stress
risks.mitigation_summary: Introduce hysteresis and anti-thrashing rules with deterministic replay coverage.
risks.rollback_plan: Pin conservative demotion thresholds and disable adaptive promotions.

risks.title: Test flake quarantine misses high-impact intermittent failures
risks.mitigation_summary: Use quarantine confidence scoring with explicit escalation hooks.
risks.rollback_plan: Reinstate strict fail-on-flake for critical suites until quarantine model is recalibrated.

risks.title: Governance artifact contracts drift from bead acceptance requirements
risks.mitigation_summary: Validate governance docs with executable contract tests and fail closed on drift.
risks.rollback_plan: Freeze milestone promotions and regenerate governance artifacts from source contracts.
open_actions: expand governance contract coverage to risk register lane

operator_verification: rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=/tmp/rch_target_rgc_risk_register cargo test -p frankenengine-engine --test rgc_risk_register
